hero.title: AI Zi Wei Dou Shu
hero.subtitle:
Combining Traditional Wisdom with Modern AI Technology
Providing More Accurate and In-depth Destiny Analysis

history.heading: üìú Historical Origins of Zi Wei Dou Shu
history.paragraph1: Zi Wei Dou Shu, also known as "Purple Star Astrology" or "Purple Star Destiny Chart", is one of the most important astrological systems in traditional Chinese divination. Its origins can be traced back to the Tang Dynasty, founded by Zhang Guo Lao (Zhang Guo), and later developed by Chen Xi Yi (Chen Tuan) and others.
history.paragraph2: Zi Wei Dou Shu centers on the Purple Star (Ziwei), combining the Twelve Palaces, Fourteen Major Stars, Six Auspicious Stars, Six Inauspicious Stars, and the dynamic changes of the Four Transformations (Transformation of Wealth, Power, Fame, and Obstruction), forming a complete system of destiny analysis.
history.paragraph3: Through the development of the Song, Yuan, Ming, and Qing dynasties, Zi Wei Dou Shu gradually became one of the four major divination systems alongside Ba Zi (Four Pillars), Face Reading, and Feng Shui, beloved by scholars and common people alike.

schools.heading: üèõÔ∏è Five Major Schools of Zi Wei Dou Shu

zhongzhou.name: Zhongzhou School
zhongzhou.subtitle: Also known as "Heluo School"
zhongzhou.description: Originating from Central China, emphasizing star combinations and palace interactions. Our system adopts this school's theory, emphasizing the integration of tradition and modernity.

sanhe.name: Sanhe School
sanhe.description: Emphasizes the Trinity relationship, focusing on the triangular combination of Life Palace, Wealth Palace, and Career Palace, paying attention to Major Cycles and Annual Fortunes.
features: Emphasizes major cycles and annual fortunes

feixing.name: Feixing School
feixing.description: Focuses on Flying Stars dynamic changes, emphasizing the influence of Four Transformations, and values time series analysis methods.

modern.name: Modern School
modern.description: Integrates modern psychology and statistics, using scientific methods to validate traditional theories, focusing on empirical analysis.

shuyuan.name: Academy School
shuyuan.description: Emphasizes classical literature research, values traditional texts inheritance, and stresses theoretical completeness.

zhanyan.name: Verification School
zhanyan.description: Values practical verification, emphasizes accuracy rate, and focuses on the accumulation and transmission of practical experience.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Zhongzhou School?
reasons: Complete Theory: Zhongzhou School has the most complete theoretical system, covering comprehensive analysis of stars, palaces, and Four Transformations
Traditional Authenticity: Directly inherited from the orthodox Zi Wei Dou Shu of ancient Central China, maintaining traditional essence
Strong Practicality: Focuses on practical application, with clear and precise star energy level assessment
Rigorous Logic: Emphasizes pattern combinations and palace interactions, with clear analytical logic

starSystem.description: Complete configuration of 14 Major Stars, including Purple Star and Heavenly Mansion systems

energyLevel.title: üéØ Energy Levels
energyLevel.description: Clear energy level assessment system for major and auxiliary stars

accuracy.title: Precise Analysis

howToUse.heading: üìñ How to Use AI Zi Wei Dou Shu System

step1.title: Step 1: Enter Basic Information
step1.description: Please prepare your name, gender, birth date and time. The system supports both Lunar and Solar calendars - choose the most convenient input method. For birth time, please use the traditional Twelve Terrestrial Branches (Zi, Chou, Yin, Mao, etc.).

step2.title: Step 2: Automatic Chart Calculation
step2.description: After clicking "Start Analysis", the system will automatically calculate your Zi Wei Dou Shu chart based on Zhongzhou School theory. This includes the configuration of the Twelve Palaces, positions of the Fourteen Major Stars, distribution of auxiliary stars, and dynamic changes of the Four Transformations. The entire process uses traditional algorithms to ensure result accuracy.

step3.title: Step 3: AI In-depth Analysis
step3.description: After chart calculation, AI will automatically perform multi-dimensional analysis of your chart, including star brightness assessment, pattern characteristic analysis, detailed Life Palace description, and overall personality and fortune summary. AI uses the GPT-4o model, capable of understanding complex divination relationships, providing professional and easy-to-understand analysis.

step4.title: Step 4: Interactive Q&A
step4.description: After receiving the initial analysis, you can ask AI specific questions, such as "How is my fortune this year?" or "What kind of work am I suitable for?" AI will combine your chart data to provide targeted answers. The system uses a conversational design, remembering previous conversation content for more coherent and in-depth analysis.

q1.question: Q1: What's the difference between Zi Wei Dou Shu and Ba Zi?
q1.answer: Zi Wei Dou Shu and Ba Zi are both important branches of traditional Chinese divination, but they differ in analytical methods. Zi Wei Dou Shu centers on stars and palaces, focusing more on detailed personality analysis and various life aspects; Ba Zi is based on Five Elements interactions, emphasizing major cycles and annual fortunes. Both have their unique features and can complement each other.

q2.question: Q2: Why choose Zhongzhou School theory?
q2.answer: Zhongzhou School (also known as Heluo School) is one of the most traditional and authentic schools of Zi Wei Dou Shu, with a complete theoretical system and rigorous logic. It directly inherits the orthodox Zi Wei Dou Shu from ancient Central China, focusing on star energy levels and pattern combination analysis, performing excellently in practical applications. Our system adopts Zhongzhou School theory to ensure analytical accuracy and professionalism.

q3.question: Q3: Is AI analysis accurate?
q3.answer: Our system uses the OpenAI GPT-4o model, combining traditional Zhongzhou School theory with extensive divination case training. AI can understand complex divination relationships, providing objective and professional analysis. However, please note that divination analysis belongs to cultural tradition and is for reference only. It should not be the sole basis for important life decisions. We recommend viewing it rationally and making judgments based on actual circumstances.

q4.question: Q4: How to improve analysis accuracy?
q4.answer: To improve analysis accuracy, please ensure the precision of your birth time, especially the birth hour (Zi hour, Chou hour, etc.). The accuracy of the hour directly affects chart calculation results. Additionally, providing specific questions and relevant background information during the Q&A session can help AI provide more targeted analysis.

q5.question: Q5: Will my data be saved?
q5.answer: We value your privacy. Chart data is only retained during the browser session and automatically cleared after closing the browser. Q&A records are kept for a maximum of 1 hour (for continuous conversation) and then automatically deleted. We do not permanently store your personal information. For details, please refer to our Privacy Policy.
